page.title: 03An Inhabitant of Sodylt Bank
page.content: A 67 year old pensioner, an ex-Ifton coal miner, lives in a large caravan called "The Mobile Home".It is situated in a large garden. A typical day in his life is as follows: get up about 5 o'clock, drink a cup of tea, wash, make the bed then breakfast.He then either goes to town or works in the garden. Gardening is his main hobby.He is a very good gardener and grows flowers and vegetables.He has previously been on BBC Anglesey with his record crops of peas, which were 10 ft 8 1/2" and 10 ft 4 1/2".They were so high he had to extend his wooden fence for them to grow on.He needed a step ladder to get to the top of them and they grew higher than his caravan.He has lots of old paper cuttings and photographs of them.
